text: Rick Pitino (born September 18, 1952 in New York City, New York) is the coach of the University of Louisville's basketball team. He used to coach the New York Knicks and the Boston Celtics. == References == ==Other websites== *Rick Pitino's Official website Category:College basketball coaches Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Rick Pitino
